definition: li (Chinese unit of length equal to 500 meters)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Gratuity is customary in this money-mad metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在这个金钱至上的都市里，给小费是司空见惯的。

sentences.english: My firm was officed in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我的公司在市里设有办公室。

sentences.english: The wounded every the moment are taken to clinics dotted ingl around city.
sentences.chinese: 目前伤员们只能往零星漫衍在市里的诊所送。

sentences.english: Every hotel in Savannah was filled with potential buyers.
sentences.chinese: 萨瓦那市里的每一间旅馆都住满了可能的买家。

sentences.english: The municipality carried out a policy on agricultural-industrial-commercial cooperation and joint development.
sentences.chinese: 市里出台了农工商共同合作共同发展的政策。

sentences.english: Most of them live in the city. We provide free commuter buses for the workers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分工人住在市里，我们有免费的通勤车接送他们。

sentences.english: There were a lot of majestic old stone buildings in Antwerp.
sentences.chinese: 安特卫普市里有着很多富丽堂皇的石造古老建筑物。

sentences.english: I got home early from the City.
sentences.chinese: 我早早地从市里回了家。

sentences.english: The botanical garden in our city is beautiful with plants from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 收集了世界各地的植物使市里的植物园非常美丽。

sentences.english: We drive across town, run into traffic, and arrive late to a meeting.
sentences.chinese: 在市里开车却遇到了交通阻塞，致使开会迟到了。

sentences.english: Taxis in the city are even affixed with panda decals .
sentences.chinese: 市里的出租车甚至都贴有大熊猫的标志。

sentences.english: She is one of the very best teachers in our city.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们市里最好的老师之一。

sentences.english: A bicycle 's often far more convenient than a car in busy cities.
sentences.chinese: 在热闹的都市里骑自行车往往比坐汽车方便得多。

sentences.english: I eon them every day in the city.
a. A rickshaw anywhere in the city costs fifteen cents.
sentences.chinese: 市里随处可见的人力车只需15美分。

sentences.english: They took the sick boy to the best hospital of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他们把病孩送到市里最好的医院。

definition: Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan, with many Han, Wei and Jin dynasty royal tombs
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
Ningling county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan
